abstract: Logan Hill profiles impressive new actors among 2015 summer movie offerings; among noteworthy performances form young stars are Bel Powley in The Diary of a Teenage Girl, Thomas Mann in Me and Earl and the Dying Girl, Shameik Moore in Dope and Kitana Kiki Rodriguez and Mya Taylor in Tangerine.
lead_paragraph: A former Nickelodeon star, a pair of transgender actresses, a show-business triple threat and a young alumna of Tom Stoppard’s “Arcadia” have striking turns in some summer’s noteworthy releases.

headline.main: Breakthrough Performances of the Summer Movies Season
headline.print_headline: New Faces Stepping Into the Sun
